title: Ticket #2526: IPv6 unit tests
description:
IPv6 code needing unit tests:
  • condor_sockaddr
    • Take the tests from /src/condor_unit_tests/FTEST_sin_to_string.cpp (which is currently #ifdef disabled). Once done, delete FTEST_sin_to_string.cpp; it's only being kept around as a source for the new test.
  • condor_netaddr
    • condor_netaddr()
    • match()
    • Test a variety of subnets, both /X form, and /xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx | /xxxx:xxxx:xxxx. Include non-multiples of 8 forms.
creator: adesmet
